sentence.Network_en: I've never gone out of my way to propitiate people.
Sacrifices were made to propitiate the gods.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们供奉祭品以求神灵息怒。

sentence.Network_en: These ancient ceremonies propitiate the spirits of the waters.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些古老的仪式让水中的神灵平息了怒气。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... perpetual a 永久的 propitiate v 获宠爱；抚慰 propitious a 幸运的，吉祥的.
propinquity 接近propitiate 安抚propitiation 安抚
propitiate<>antagonize劝解<>引起反抗 propitiate<>incense劝解<>激怒 propitious<>unfavorable吉利的<>不利的 proponent<>detractor支持者<>反对者 prosaic<&gt.
prophesy 预言propitiate 使息怒,抚慰propitious 慈悲,有利,吉利的

list.abs: 华夏祖先 Chinese ancestors吉祥之地 propitious place祭祀天地 offer sacrifices to Heaven and Earth
propitiatory 安抚的propitious winds 顺风propitious 吉利的
瑞狮 in English, translation, example... ... 瑞朗 Swiss franc 瑞气 propitious vapours 瑞色 lovely color.
Sinograma « 兆 » - Diccionario de Sinogramas ... 征兆 zhēng zhào 吉兆[ good omen;propitious sign] 京兆[ capital].

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (as propitiation): from Latin propitiat- 'made favourable', from the verb propitiare, from propitius 'favourable, gracious' (see propitious)

entry.def: If you propitiate someone, you stop them being angry or impatient by doing something to please them.

example.ex: I've never gone out of my way to propitiate people...
These ancient ceremonies propitiate the spirits of the waters.
example.tran: 这些古老的仪式让水中的神灵平息了怒气。

auth_sentence.content: In order to propitiate himself, apparently.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In order to propitiate himself, apparently.

auth_sentence.content: His attempt to propitiate her, to get her on his side.
auth_sentence.res_content: His attempt to propitiate her, to get her on his side.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His attempt to propitiate her, to get her on his side.

stems_affixes.word_buile: centri=centr中心+pet追+al……的→追求中心的→向心的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有能力的,能胜任的;足够的
竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: compete[v.比赛,竞争]+itive……的→adj.竞争的;好竞争的;[价格等的]有竞争力的
per全部永久+pet追求,寻求+ual……的→追求永久的
pet追求,寻求+ulant多……的→追求太多,导致脾气不好
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ous……的→在[别人]前面追到→幸运的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 食欲,胃口;欲望,性欲;爱好,趣味
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap一再+pet追求,寻求+ite表名词→一再追求→有胃口
appet=appetite胃口+izer东西→n.开胃食品,开胃物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 能力,胜任某种工作的资格
stems_affixes.word_buile: competent[[adj.有能力的,能胜任的;足够的]]省鷑.能力,胜任某种工作的资格
compete[v.比赛,竞争]+ition表名词→n.竞争, 竞赛
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
petition[n.请愿书,申请书 v.[向…]请愿,正式请求]+er人→n.请愿人
per全部,永久+pet追求,寻求+uate=ate表动词→追求永久
pet追求,寻求+ition表名词→追寻状态→请愿[词性变化:可做动词]
pro前+piti=pet追求,寻求+ate表动词→追到前面去→获宠爱

sentences.en: propitiate the gods with a sacrifice.
